mapper.insert: insert into SYS_Menu( menu_id, menu_number, menu_nodename, menu_nodepath, menu_rootnode, menu_isrootnode, menu_isleafnode, menu_parentnode, menu_parentnodenumber, menu_createtime ) values ( #{menu_id,jdbcType=int}, #{menu_number,jdbcType=varchar}, #{menu_nodename,jdbcType=varchar}, #{menu_nodepath,jdbcType=varchar}, #{menu_rootnode,jdbcType=varchar}, #{menu_isrootnode,jdbcType=bit}, #{menu_isleafnode,jdbcType=bit}, #{menu_parentnode,jdbcType=varchar}, #{menu_parentnodenumber,jdbcType=varchar}, #{menu_createtime,jdbcType=datetime} )
mapper.update: update SYS_Menuset menu_id = #{menu_id,jdbcType=int}, menu_number = #{menu_number,jdbcType=varchar}, menu_nodename = #{menu_nodename,jdbcType=varchar}, menu_nodepath = #{menu_nodepath,jdbcType=varchar}, menu_rootnode = #{menu_rootnode,jdbcType=varchar}, menu_isrootnode = #{menu_isrootnode,jdbcType=bit}, menu_isleafnode = #{menu_isleafnode,jdbcType=bit}, menu_parentnode = #{menu_parentnode,jdbcType=varchar}, menu_parentnodenumber = #{menu_parentnodenumber,jdbcType=varchar}, menu_createtime = #{menu_createtime,jdbcType=datetime} where menu_id = #{id,jdbcType=int}
